column3: utACK ac78e5c.\n\nIt would be nice to have one initialization flavour. Also, split members that don't have to be initialized with a comment.
Addressed @MarcoFalke:s feedback initialization order. Now also initializing `beginCycles` to zero for consistency and completeness.\n\nPlease re-review :-)

Yeah let's change it to
```c++
State(std::string _name, duration _maxElapsed) :
name(_name),
maxElapsed(_maxElapsed),
count(0),
minTime(duration::max()), 
maxTime(duration::zero()),
minCycles(std::numeric_limits<uint64_t>::max()),
maxCycles(maxCycles = std::numeric_limits<uint64_t>::min()),
countMask(1),
lastCycles(0)
```
Makes it easier to see that everything is initiali
Oh, of course. Now fixed! Thanks for notifying :-)
